name: 賴冠廷
objective:
使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：
（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係
（２）視窗環境
（３）網路環境
（４）整合設計
本實習主要以Android平台為主. 另外將介紹如何將OpenCV與深度學習演算法整合進APP中.
schedule:
1. Android Overview & Architecture
2. Android Application Anatomy & Hello World Example
3. Intents & Filters and Event Handling
4. UI Layouts & Controls and Styles & Themes
5. Location-bsasd Services & Google Map
6. APP publishing, Facebook Integration
7. Push Notification and FireBase
8. SQL & sqlite
9. Final Project Proposal
10. Audio Manager & Audio Capture
11. Sensors, Bluetooth, NFC
12. Image Effects and Animations
13. Camera Manager and Screencast
14. Video Streaming
15. OpenCV and Image Processing
Deep Learning
16. TensorFlow Mobile - Speech Recognition
17. TensorFlow Mobile - Object Detection
18. Final Project Demo
scorePolicy:
課程參與和繳交課堂作業 (70%)
期末專題 (30%)

期末專題1 ~ 4人一組. 程式需發布於Google Play並可下載.
評分標準:
老師評分(60%)
各組互評(40%)
materials: 以Android document和教師自製投影片為主
